Name: A longitudinal neuroimaging dataset on language processing in children ages 5, 7, and 9 years old
ReferencesAndLinks: Wang, J., Joanisse, M., Booth, J.R.(2021). Letter fluency in 7-8-year-old children is related to the anterior, but not posterior, ventral occipito-temporal cortex during an auditory phonological task. Developmental Cognitive Neuroscience, 47, 100898. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S187892932030147X
Wang, J., Rice, M.L., Booth, J.R. (2020). Semantic and syntactic specializatio during auditory sentence processing in 7-8-year-old children. Cortex. Registered report (IPA) at https://osf.io/xs9aq

Wang, J., Rice, M.L., Booth, J.R. (2020). Syntactic and semantic specialization and integration in 5- to 6-year-old children during auditory sentence processing. Journal of Cognitive Neuroscience, 32(1),36-49. https://www.mitpressjournals.org/doi/full/10.1162/jocn_a_01477

Wang, J., Joanisse, M.F., Booth, J.R. (2020). Neural representations of phonology in temporal cortex scaffold longitudinal reading gains in 5- to 7-year-old children. NeuroImage, 207, 116359. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1053811919309504
Yamasaki, B. L., McGregor, K. K., & Booth, J. R. (2019). Early Phonological Neural Specialization Predicts Later Growth in Word Reading Skills.preprint at https://psyarxiv.com/vjkdf/

Younger, J.W., Lee, K.W., Demir-Lira, O.E., & Booth, J.R. (2019). Brain lateralization of phonological awareness varies by maternal education. Developmental Science, 22(6), e12807. https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/desc.12807

Wang J., Joanisse M.F., Booth J.R. (2018). Reading skill related to left ventral occipitotemporal cortex during a phonological awareness task in 5-6-year old children. Developmental Cognitive Neuroscience, 30, 116-122. https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1878929317301494

Weiss, Y., Cweigenberg, H.G., Booth, J.R. (2018). Neural specialization of phonological and semantic processing in young children. Human Brain Mapping, 39(11), 4334-4348. https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/hbm.24274
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Wang J, Lytle M, Weiss Y, Yamasaki B & Booth JR. (2021) A longitudinal neuroimaging dataset on language processing in children ages 5, 7, and 9 years old. preprint at https://psyarxiv.com/tpndf
